passages.text:
You know what the worst part of being a ghost is?
[[You're dead?]]
[[Seems kind of cool to me, actually.]]
[[It must be boring.]]
[[The lack of company?]]

links.name: Seems kind of cool to me, actually.
links.link: Seems kind of cool to me, actually.

passages.name: root

passages.text:
You're dead?
[[Well, yeah. But I miss my wife.]]

links.name: Well, yeah. But I miss my wife.
links.link: Well, yeah. But I miss my wife.

passages.name: You're dead?

passages.text:
Seems kind of cool to me, actually.
[[Maybe I can help you become one.]]

links.name: Maybe I can help you become one.
links.link: Maybe I can help you become one.

passages.name: Seems kind of cool to me, actually.

passages.text:
It must be boring.
[[Well, yeah. But I miss my wife.]]

links.name: Well, yeah. But I miss my wife.
links.link: Well, yeah. But I miss my wife.

passages.name: It must be boring.

passages.text:
The lack of company?
[[Yes, exactly! I miss my wife.]]

links.name: Yes, exactly! I miss my wife.
links.link: Yes, exactly! I miss my wife.

passages.name: The lack of company?

passages.text:
Well, yeah. But I miss my wife.
[[Isn't there some way to see her?]]
[[Oh yeah, she's long gone.]]
[[I'm sorry to hear that.]]
[[Is there anything I can do?]]

links.name: Isn't there some way to see her?
links.link: Isn't there some way to see her?

links.name: Is there anything I can do?
links.link: Is there anything I can do?

passages.name: Well, yeah. But I miss my wife.

passages.text:
Maybe I can help you become one.
[[Sorry, I didn't mean that.]]
[[Please do.]]
[[Uhh... I think I'll pass.]]
[[... what's the worst part?]]
passages.name: Maybe I can help you become one.

... what's the worst part?

passages.name: ... what's the worst part?

passages.name: I miss my wife.

passages.text:
Isn't there some way to see her?
[[I don't know. But as long as I'm stuck as a ghost, I won't be able to find out.]]

links.name: I don't know. But as long as I'm stuck as a ghost, I won't be able to find out.
links.link: I don't know. But as long as I'm stuck as a ghost, I won't be able to find out.

passages.name: Isn't there some way to see her?

passages.text:
I'm sorry to hear that.
[[Thanks. I hope that if I can be released from being a ghost, I'll be able to see her again.]]

links.name: Thanks. I hope that if I can be released from being a ghost, I'll be able to see her again.
links.link: Thanks. I hope that if I can be released from being a ghost, I'll be able to see her again.

passages.name: I'm sorry to hear that.

[[I don't know. But as long as I'm stuck as a ghost, I won't be able to find out.]]
